sentence.Network_en: Khanty - Mansi's regional capital, scene of the holiday revelries, is being rebuilt with oil - tax proceeds.
sentence.Network_cn: 汉特—曼西的首府, 也就是这场节日狂欢的举行地点, 目前正运用石油税收来进行重建.

list.abs: 5. 精进(viriya)6. 忍辱(khanti)7. 实相(sacca)

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the nomadic Ugrian people living in northwestern Siberia (east of the Ural mountains)
2. a Ugric language (related to Hungarian) spoken by the Ostyak people
